Class DOTOutputWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • swiftsolutions.output.DOTOutputWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OutputWriter

    public class DOTOutputWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements OutputWriter
    Implementation of OutputWriter for the scheduling application. See OutputWriter.

      • serialize

        public void serialize(java.lang.String filename,
                      Schedule schedule,
                      java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Task> offsetTaskMap)
               throws OutputException
        The function that will write the output.
        Specified by:
        serialize in interface OutputWriter
        Parameters:
        filename - the file for the output to be written into.
        schedule - the schedule that will be written into the output file.
        offsetTaskMap - the task information from the input.
        Throws:
        OutputException - if the task information or schedule was malformed.

      • writeNode

        private void writeNode(java.lang.Integer task,
                       int processorID,
                       int startTime)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Used to write a node to the output file.
        Parameters:
        task - the task to be written (node).
        processorID - the processorId that the task has been scheduled on.
        startTime - the start time of the node.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the node, or arguments are malformed.

      • writeEdge

        private void writeEdge(java.lang.Integer parentTask,
                       java.lang.Integer childTask,
                       int weight)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Used to write an edge to the output file.
        Parameters:
        parentTask - the parent node corresponding to the edge.
        childTask - the child node corresponding to the edge.
        weight - the communication cost (weight) of the weight
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the edge or arguments are malformed.

      • convertTaskID

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Task> convertTaskID(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Task> tasks)
        Undoes the normalization of the task id that was done in the input parsing.
        Parameters:
        tasks - tasks to be un-normalized.
        Returns:
        the un-normalized set of tasks.
